If you are a federal employee who has been recently separated from your employment, NYSDOL is here to help.

WARN Notices

Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification
2025 WARN Notices

Click on the company name for further details.

As of 4/1/2025, WARN notices will no longer be posted to the database and can be found in the new WARN Dashboard. You can filter WARN notices by county, industry, Workforce Development Board, and notice details. Notices can also be downloaded directly from the dashboard. View the new WARN Dashboard.

2016-2024 WARN Notices
Looking for a Past Notice?

Our WARN Database is currently undergoing a redesign and system upgrade to allow for more functionality.  Past WARN notices are posted below by year. If you would like to request the full documentation for any of the past notices, please email [email protected]. Please include the name of the company and the date of the notice you are requesting.
